pitch.cc: That was pitch number 45 for Jeff Samardzija; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .233 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .394 off him after that.
Jeff Samardzija is trying to tie up Ryan Hanigan with fastballs inside; Hanigan is hitting .333 on pitches in that location compared to .265 overall.
